channel.title: Carbon County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Carbon County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 240
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at Exit 240 - Business Loop US-6/UT-55 East/100 North. This is the western end of the Price business loop.

item.title: US-191 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-191 north. Distance to Duchesne and Flaming Gorge Dam.

item.title: US-191 North - Price River
item.description: Price River on US-191 north in Carbon County.

item.title: US-191 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-191 north. Distance to Duchesne.

item.title: US-191 North - Dinosaur Diamond Scenic Byway
item.description: US-191 North - Dinosaur Diamond Scenic Byway in Carbon County.

item.title: US-6 East at US-191
item.description: US-6 East at US-191 junction. Turn left for US-191 north to Duchesne. Continue ahead for US-6 East/US-191 South towards Helper and Price. US-191 joins US-6 east to the junction with I-70 near Green River. Thence from there US-191 follows I-70 and US-6 east to Crescent Junction.

item.title: US-6 East at US-191
item.description: US-6 east at US-191. Turn left for US-191 north. US-191 south joins US-6 south to Crescent Junction.

item.title: US-6 East at US-191
item.description: US-6 East at US-191 junction. Turn left for US-191 north to Duchesne. Continue ahead for US-6 East/US-191 South towards Helper and Price. US-191 joins US-6 east to the junction with I-70 near Green River. Thence from there US-191 follows I-70 and US-6 east to Crescent Junction.

item.title: US-6 East at US-191
item.description: US-6 east at US-191. Turn left for US-191 north. US-191 south joins US-6 south to Crescent Junction.

item.title: US-6 East at US-191
item.description: US-6 east at US-191. Turn left for US-191 north. US-191 south joins US-6 south to Crescent Junction.

item.title: US-6 East - Carbon County
item.description: Entering Carbon County on US-6 east.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North at Martin Road
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North at Martin Road interchange.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - Exit 232
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North at Exit 232 - N. Main St.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North at UT-244
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 north at UT-244. Exit here for UT-244/Business US-6/Poplar St.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North at UT-139/UT-157
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North at UT-139/UT-157. This is the southern end of the Helper business loop.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - UT-157/US-139 Jct.
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North approaching UT-157/UT-139 junction. Turn right on UT-157/US-139 for Spring Glen and Kneilworth.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North at Exit 240
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North at Exit 240 - UT-55 East/100 North.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - Exit 241
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North at Exit 241 - UT-10 South/Carbon Ave.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - Exit 243
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North - Exit 243. Use left lanes for Salt Lake. Right lanes are for Exit 243.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - Exit 243
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North at Exit 243 - Business Loop 6/Price.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North Approaching Exit 243
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North approaching Exit 243 - Business Loop US-6/Price. The is the eastern end of the Price business loop.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - Price Next 3 Exits
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North - Price Next 3 Exits. A freeway beings here that bypasses Price. Some of the freeway is only one lane in each direction.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North Approaching UT-123
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North approaching UT-123. Use UT-123 for East Carbon and Sunnyside. Continue on US-6 West/US-191 North for Price.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North Approaching UT-123
item.description: US-6 West/US-191 North approaching UT-123.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at UT-123
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at UT-123 in Carbon County.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching UT-123
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South approaching UT-123 in Carbon County.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at Price Exit
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at (Exit 243) Price. This is the eastern end of the Price business loop. Continue on US-6 East/US-191 South for I-70 (in Green River).

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 243
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South approaching Exit 243 - East Price. This is the eastern end of the Price business loop.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 241
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at Exit 241 - UT-10 South/Castle Dale.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 240
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at Exit 240 - Business Loop US-6/Price. This is the western end of the Price business loop. US-6 South/US-191 East continues south towards I-70 Junction (in Green River).

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at UT-139/UT-157
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at UT-139/UT-157 junction in Helper. This is the south entrance into Helper from US-6/US-191.

item.title: Bus. US-6 East at US-6 West/US-191 North
item.description: Bus. US-6 East at US-6 West/US-191 North onramp towards Salt Lake City.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 232 Offramp
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South on Exit 232 Offramp. Turn left for (Business Loop US-6) Downtown Helper. Turn right for Spring Canyon and West Helper.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 232
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at Exit 232 - Business US-6/UT-244/N. Main St. This is the western end of the Helper business loop.

item.title: Merge Left For US-6 East
item.description: Merge left for US-6 east on US-6 East/US-191 South in Helper. The right lane becomes an exit only lane for Exit 232.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - West Helper
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at West Helper Interchange.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South near Helper
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South near Helper. The sign beneath the shield designates this stretch of highway as a segment of Dinosaur Diamond Byway - part of America’s Byway System.

item.title: US-6 East at US-191
item.description: US-6 East at US-191 junction. Turn left for US-191 north to Duchesne. Continue ahead for US-6 East/US-191 South towards Helper and Price. US-191 joins US-6 east to the junction with I-70 near Green River. Thence from there US-191 follows I-70 and US-6 east to Crescent Junction.
